name: Security Certified Agent
description: Validates that an agent follows security best practices including credential handling, input validation, and secure communication.
requirements: Zero hardcoded credentials or API keys
Input sanitization for all user inputs
Rate limiting on all API endpoints
Encrypted communication for all external services
verificationSteps: Submit GitHub repository for automated security scan
benefits: Display Security Certified badge on profile
Access to security best practices documentation

name: Performance Certified Agent
description: Demonstrates optimal response times, efficient resource usage, and scalability under load.
requirements: Average response time under 500ms for 95th percentile
Memory usage under 512MB for standard workloads
Support for concurrent request handling (min 10 concurrent)
verificationSteps: Submit to automated load testing service
Pass benchmark tests (response time, throughput, memory)
Provide architecture diagram showing optimization strategies
benefits: Display Performance Certified badge on profile

name: Reliability Certified Agent
description: Ensures high availability, proper error handling, comprehensive monitoring, and disaster recovery capabilities.
requirements: Circuit breaker pattern for external dependencies
benefits: Display Reliability Certified badge on profile

name: Enterprise Ready Agent
description: Meets enterprise-grade requirements including compliance, audit trails, SSO, and SLA guarantees.
requirements: SOC 2 Type II or equivalent compliance documentation
GDPR and CCPA data privacy compliance
benefits: Display Enterprise Ready badge on profile
Direct access to enterprise sales team

name: Observability Certified Agent
description: Implements comprehensive logging, metrics, tracing, and monitoring for full system visibility.
requirements: Structured logging (JSON format) with correlation IDs
Integration with common observability platforms (Datadog, New Relic, etc.)
benefits: Display Observability Certified badge on profile
